story: An exiled anxiety-ridden homebody must battle an alien who found its way into her home.
Comment: Enjoyed the movie, great storyline and characters. A few twists kept it interesting!
Disliked the movie. The storyline felt forced, and the characters lacked depth.
Impressive film! The duration was just right, and the unexpected turns added to the excitement.
Saw X is a rollercoaster of emotions. Gripping from start to finish!
The rating is justified. A solid 7.1 for a unique storyline and compelling characters.
Mixed feelings about Saw X. Some moments were brilliant, while others fell flat.
Not for the faint-hearted. Saw X is a thrilling experience, but not everyones cup of tea.
Saw X exceeded my expectations. The story was dark and twisted, just as I like it.
7.1 is too generous. Saw X was a letdown, especially considering the hype.
The duration felt just right. Saw X delivered a gripping story without dragging it out.
